attributes.action: Support Chinese peace talks between Russia and Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: Talks are the only way to bring about a ceasefire, protect humanitarian corridors and broker a lasting peace.
attributes.background: Applaud and support China's efforts to bring about peace and a way forward for Ukraine. Do not obstruct these plans because of other issues. An end to this war is the priority.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624252
